title: Rendering Lists
story: Rendering lists is a common task in React. Let's learn how to display arrays of data!
instructions: Create a TodoList component that accepts a 'tasks' prop (an array of strings). Render each task in a <li> element inside a <ul> element. Remember to add a unique 'key' prop to each <li>!
